answer: Cristiano Ronaldo is a renowned Portuguese footballer born in 1985. He played for Manchester United, Real Madrid, and currently for Al Nassr. He is known for his numerous records and awards, including multiple Ballon d'Or titles.

results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo
results.content: Born in Funchal, Madeira, Ronaldo began his career with Sporting CP before signing with Manchester United in 2003. He became a star player at United, where he

results.title: Cristiano Ronaldo | Biography, Football, & Facts
results.content: Cristiano Ronaldo | Biography, Football, & Facts | Britannica Ronaldo joined Clube Desportivo Nacional of Madeira and then transferred to Sporting Clube de Portugal (known as Sporting Lisbon), where he played for that club’s various youth football (soccer) teams before making his debut on Sporting’s first team in 2002.He signed with English powerhouse Manchester United in 2003. Ronaldo scored 42 goals for Real across all competitions in 2016–17 and led his team to La Liga and Champions League titles that season, which resulted in a fifth career Ballon d’Or award. results.title: Who Is Cristiano Ronaldo?
results.content: When he was just twelve years old, Cristiano Ronaldo was recruited to play professional soccer for a team in Portugal, 600 miles from his home on the island of Madeira, a region of Portugal.
